nodes.text: The Hutt Domain was the confederation composed of individual   Hutt clans. Despite pretense of legitimacy, it was prone to instability due to it corrupt giving its oligarchy nature and the fact it is was entirely tied to the organized crime of the Hutt Cartel.
Despite this, the Hutt Domain was considered a galactic power until 26 ABY when it was pushed out of Hutt Space by the Yuuzhan Vong  after being overrun during their invasion.
